argumentText:
ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | gaid2.1 | |- X = ( Base ` G ) |
| 2 |  | gaid2.2 | |- .+ = ( +g ` G ) |
| 3 |  | gaid2.3 | |- F = ( x e. X , y e. X |-> ( x .+ y ) ) |
| 4 | 1 | #P_subgid | |- ( G e. Grp -> X e. ( SubGrp ` G ) ) |
| 5 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( G |`s X ) = ( G |`s X ) |
| 6 | 1, 2, 5, 3 | #P_subgga | |- ( X e. ( SubGrp ` G ) -> F e. ( ( G |`s X ) GrpAct X ) ) |
| 7 | 4, 6 | #P_syl | |- ( G e. Grp -> F e. ( ( G |`s X ) GrpAct X ) ) |
| 8 | 1 | #P_ressid | |- ( G e. Grp -> ( G |`s X ) = G ) |
| 9 | 8 | #P_oveq1d | |- ( G e. Grp -> ( ( G |`s X ) GrpAct X ) = ( G GrpAct X ) ) |
| 10 | 7, 9 | #P_eleqtrd | |- ( G e. Grp -> F e. ( G GrpAct X ) ) |
